tool_description:
The Best Bible API out there.

The Bible API is an easy-to-use web service that allows you to retrieve The Old Testament and The New Testament based on a chapter or selected verse. The API provides access to the King James Version (KJV) of the Bible, which is widely considered to be one of the most accurate and widely-used translations of the Bible in the English language.
name: Holy Bible
title: Holy Bible

api_list.name: GetBooks
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ajith-holy-bible.p.rapidapi.com/GetBooks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ajith-holy-bible.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ajith-holy-bible.p.rapidapi.com/GetBooks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ajith-holy-bible.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
